We got 3 videos sent to us afterwards. The longest was 3 mins, I think. It's worth the cost. There are a lot of games so it's good for repeat visits. Heck, you could repeat the same game because it's hard to master in one visit. Highly recommended.

Name: Karen Chan
Review: Additionally, upon contacting the organizers to inquire why we were unable to choose all the advertised games, we were informed that we would have to schedule another session to play the remaining two games with duplicate games we already played. This response was quite baffling and only added to our disappointment. Spending $77 for just 30 minutes of play, during which we didn't get to experience all the games, doesn't seem like a worthwhile investment. We expected a comprehensive and fulfilling experience for the price we paid, and unfortunately, the reality fell short of our expectations.

Review: We played deadwood valley, the game was intensive. Our host Carole was so nice and helpful ! Highly recommend !

Review: Fantastic immersive experience.  Did Shard

Name: Qxeen Dani
Responce: Hi Danielle, thank you for your feedback.',"Being understandable to our customers is always our priority.  Although we require 24 hours' notice in advance for cancellation or reschedule, we understand unexpected things would happen, and we always try our best to accommodate our customers.  Unfortunately, we could not assist you further after we made two times exceptions to reschedule for your groups already within the past month.",'Once again, we are very thankful for having your team experience our service, and we wish to have you visit us in the future.  If you have any other concerns, please feel free to contact us, and we are always here for you.  Thank you very much.

Review: Derek make an amazing job

Review: Was an extremely fun VR experience. Choose your weapons carefully! Staff explained things well and the game play was fun.

Name: Jenny Sha
Review: Pretty good go again

Name: Lucía S
Review: This was a lot of fun, even if you're doing VR for the first time. We had some issues with the equipment, and some of it needs a change, but it was a great experience for team building or just to enjoy with friends. You get to keep some videos with people in the VR world and in real world.

Name: Henry H
Review: So much fun and not expensive, very well organized too

Name: Crystle
Review: My group and I had an amazing time doing the Seekers of the Shard Dragonfire experience! It was so much fun choosing your powers and weapons, interacting with the enemies in the game and getting to choose your own path instead of the game just deciding for you. The visuals were stunning and they had some special effects too. Our host, Char, did an excellent job of making sure we understood how the experience works and took good care of us. I definitely want to come back here and try some of the other games!

Name: John Rato
Review: Seekers of the chard was amazing! Char is superb.

Name: Tammy Boodram
Review: Seekers of the Shard was fun! Char was really nice and helpful

Name: Madison St. Jacques
Review: Booked The Deadwood Valley gaming experience for my husband and his friends for his 35th birthday party. I reached out to Sandbox to confirm and book a space for lunch as the website describes areas to host birthdays and team building events. When we got there they had no idea what we were talking about and sadly our catered lunch sat on the dusty floor while we finished the game. We ended up having to take our food home. Overall the gaming experience was super cool and fun but we imagined something a bit more out of the facility like dedicated seating area's for the duration of the game, lockers and perhaps the opportunity to play more than one game, especially for the fee.

Name: Patrick Krishnan
Review: really fun and immersive! derek was super chill and helpful! definitely coming back

Name: Amit Sevilla
Review: Really great gameplay and experience! The birthday party at the end was fun!

Name: John T
Review: Derek was great

Name: kyle mclean
Review: Lots of fun and exceeded my expectations of a VR experience. Derek was very helpful and friendly, and made it a comfortable atmosphere for my group. You get a good cardio workout (quite sweaty at the end), I usually take around 2500 steps in the experience and have done seekers of the shard VR twice to take different paths. My only complaint is it is expensive and you are in game for around 45 minutes. At $60 a person it really adds up, but that is my only complaint. I would like to see the price come down to be more accessible for more frequent plays.

Name: Wendy
Review: This was so much fun! Definitely recommend coming here! Be prepared to sweat! Derek was super friendly and helpful!

Name: Allyster Charles
Review: Absolutely amazing, had an awesome experience. Definitely going back.

Review: I've been to Sandbox VR twice and it is super fun for all ages (children, teens, young adults, and older adults). Staff are very friendly. Shout out to Derrek who made our experience fun today.

Name: Said Saleh
Review: Overall, Sandbox VR gets a 7 out of 10 from me. Great VR, but could improve in time management and communication. Be prepared for a short, fun experience and possible delays.

Name: sco jo
Review: I think it was a great time because I got to be a black man even though I am a white man and I got to see what a quality really felt like it was exhilarating for my birthday and squid games was extra fun and they really took care of me in good ways and I think it was a positive experience for me and I think for society as a whole

Name: noella oliver
Review: A good experience spoiled by 1 person who lacked communication skills. Do better.

Name: Dennis Tang
Review: First time playing and I must say it is quite the experience! The only downside I found was it felt very hot with the gear on. Overall I would come again. Played the squid game. I'm looking forward to trying deadwood Valley in the near future.

Name: Mary nicole lorenzana
Review: This time around the game (Amber Sky 2088) was much shorter and unfortunately some of the sensors were a bit off and the game had to be stopped to troubleshoot it. But that takes away from the experience. Due to the  shorter time frame and malfunctioning equipment it was like most sequals -not as good as the first one. Therefore only three stars overall.

Name: Kartiki Sharma
Review: Huge thanks to Derek for happily hosting/helping us setup and being standup to troubleshoot/pause when needed. We look forward to coming back again!

Name: Benjamin Chevoor
Review: 3) Someone wearing the equipment before me had a reaaaally strong perfume. It's all I could smell during the experience. It soaked into my clothes and was all I could smell after until I changed and showered. Gross.

Name: Nam La
Review: Deadwood Valley was good. 30 mins went by fast.

Name: Paris I
Review: Honestly, couldn't believe how much fun we had. Staff were great and very helpful. Facilities were clean. The video recording is really nice to have. All in all, 10/10 experience!

Name: Marco Yee (Icyy)
Review: Not really sure if it was just my headset, I am a vr enthusiast. I personally owned the first HTC vive, the oculus rift, I've previously owned a quest 2 and my daily driver is a quest 3. I've never used a Pico before (the one that sandbox uses) but the frame rate is absolute garbage. I would say that the avg frame rate you're probably looking at is sub 50 fps. For people that don't play vr normally, this can be vomit inducing. There are times where the frame literally freezes for a second and you won't be able to orient yourself. The staff were nice though so that's +1 star. If you go with a group of 6, you're better off taking your money and buying 2 quest 2's for 300 each and getting whatever game piques you're interest. You actually get to keep the headsets and there's always more games out coming out. The hand and feet tracking is just a gimmick and doesn't affect gameplay.

Name: Kingsong Chen
Review: Very fun!

Name: Jason Delport
Review: Had a very good first experience here. Staff were very helpful. All the equipment was well sanitized between players and they have a good selection of games and group sizes to choose from. We chose Dead Wood Valley. I knew it was killing zombies but boy is it a workout! We were a party of 4 and we were sweating at the end. A great load of fun! Would highly recommend. You have a place to keep your belongings safe, washrooms and water fountains if needed.

Name: Vinoth
Review: My first VR experience. Had a blast with Deadwood Valley game. Staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Cant wait to try rest of the games.

Name: Tony Corsillo
Review: Otherwise it was a Fantastic experience that makes you want to keep playing and definitely get one of these units for home use.

Name: Ash z
Review: Super cool experience. Great indoor activity.

Name: tania martina
Review: I only can say 5 stars for the game and the services!

Name: Yi Chen
Review: Very fun to play!

Name: JINAL PATEL
Review: An amazing experience and fun.

Name: Aidan Mills
Review: Bad appointment setting, preservation only on weekends, Even if it's practically empty. I Will not be coming back

Name: Ms. Drecia Black
Review: Derek is the guy!!! Super chill and a vibe my group loved his energy.

Name: Roshan Chopra
Review: Insane amounts of fun. Had a group of 4 people play Seekers of the Shard. 4 people seems like a good number 5 or 6 might feel crowded. Make sure the goggles are on tight otherwise they slide down because you will get VERY sweaty. The set up and tutorials took about 15-20 min. Which means actual gameplay is only about 30 min. It goes by way too fast. Needs to be 45 min of gameplay. This is really the only negative about the whole experience.

Name: Shaun_92
Review: Had a somewhat negative experience. With 4 other people I played amber sky 2088 and it wasn't the best experience. The game was choppy and laggy for me especially when alot of enemies came on screen, this made the game almost unplayable for me. Also some of the equipment malfunctioned which didn't help things whatsoever, I'm very disappointed! I really wanted to like it, but unfortunately my experience didn't met my expectations coming in. A huge letdown.

Name: Kevin Weber
Review: Mostly fun, but knocked it down a few points because my very small group was greeted by someone who seem very irritated that we didn't know how it worked for signing in the first time. He said "Oh cool. So you also probably don't event know what you want to play." Though we did. Twas very condescending. Otherwise very fun.
Responce: Hi Kevin, We extend our gratitude for your favorable review and candid feedback. If it would not inconvenience you, we would greatly appreciate the opportunity to discuss further the incident that occurred during the event. Kindly share your contact details with us via email at toronto@sandboxvr.com or by contacting us directly at 416-964-6666. We eagerly anticipate engaging in a productive conversation with you.  Thank you.

Name: Patricia O
Review: I went with a group and we did the Squid Game experience. Very fun!

Name: Bogar Ascencio
Review: What is the cost?

Name: Matthew O'Brian
Review: Fun, dynamic, fast paced games!

Name: Hafiz Badamasi
Review: Derek was an amazing help

Name: Ashim Thapa
Review: Really enjoyed the games over here, great place for group of friends to try VR games.

Name: Tabitha Taylor
Review: Had a blast! So much fun!! This was our 3rd time here

Name: Matthew Beck
Review: Had a great time playing Amber Sky - Evan was super helpful in getting us set up and talking us through the system!

Name: Hassan Azmy
Review: Went for the first time and we tried the squid game. It's so realistic we had an amazing time. DEREK WAS THE BEST!!! He took great care of us and assisted us throughout the experience. Thanks for him definitely coming back again!!

Name: Pierson Hayes
Review: Totally exceeded my expectations. Worth every dollar! Already booking my next VR experience!

Name: John Polak
Review: Motion tracking did not function well.

Name: Arianne Janelle
Review: Came here with my boyfriend, my brother and his girlfriend and had a blast! It was very fun and interactive! We love that we get a recap video at the end! Definitely coming back to try the other experiences they have

Name: Mark Uy
Review: Super fun, but bring an extra shirt as it gets sweaty!

Name: Max Siva
Review: It's very cool, but I wouldn't say it's worth it at that price. The headset was glitchy, when you are playing the game the screen sometimes turned black. Also it was very repetitive. Just standing in a square shooting zombies. It would have been cool if you can walk around.

Name: B Chan
Review: Prepare to sweat a lot !

Name: Jasmit Kaur
Review: It was a great experience our group really enjoyed the game. The staff was friendly and helped us through the game on all our technical issues.

Name: Kimberly Spice
Review: We had a great time. Being fully immersed in the game was fun for all of us. No issues at all. Seamless. Nice staff as well.

Name: ToP tEaChA
Review: 100% recommend it

Name: Si Le (Si2k78)
Review: 2 in our group wanted to give it a 4, but I vetoed it.

Name: Nelly O
Review: Absolutely the best experience ever! 10/10!

Name: Sandro Dalupang
Review: I went there with 3 other friends few days ago. First time ever doing VR for all of us. Glad we chose this place. The graphics were amazing. Not at all pixelated. The space to maneuver around was big enough that it allowed for all us to really share in the experience. Evan our host kept us well informed about our game and many others. Would definitely come back. Highly recommend.

Name: Aaron S.
Review: Overall, this was such a great and memorable experience ! You should definitely try it out !

Name: RJ Auto
Review: Amazing experience! Deadwood Valley was so much fun. Staff was friendly. Be ready to work up a sweat!

Name: Julie McGann
Review: Went with a few friends from out of town today. Had a great time. Would do this again.

Name: Jenn A
Review: Was an ok experience, not worth the $60 price tag but not terrible. My 2 star review is based on our experience that day-a number of ppl in our group were dropped at different times due to dying batteries. The game had to be stopped each time and their pack replaced. Took away from the experience and nothing was done (ie no time was added for the delays). It happened during major fight scenes which took away from the excitement-I wouldn't return.

Name: Earl Adanvor
Review: We had a great time

Name: Cj Mades
Review: Would recommend, shout out to Derek

Name: Yatri bhatt
Review: Bigger groups have more fun!

Name: Cassie
Review: There's better vr experiences out there. Specifically ones that use the oculus rift vr.. you'll enjoy that much more than this.

Name: Dhaval Fofandi
Review: Really we had a wonderful experience but after this incident I thought I wasted my money!

Name: Benji Portwin (Benji)
Review: Awesome fun

Name: Clark Mercado
Review: Had a great guys night out here. Our host Swalah was excellent, thorough and attentive. It was a very pleasurable first experience here, they have a good diversity of games for all types of ages and tastes. Deadwood valley was spectacular from the level design to the physical feel of the vr equipment. The only issue I found was that the sound effects and music were loud to the point where it overpowered my teammates voices for callouts. Other than that i think Sandbox VR implements a solid and outstanding take on next generation full-body immersion vr gaming.

Name: Tamoor A
Review: Loved the experience in the past but had a few technical issues last time and they've changed the way you pay and now staff are asking for tips? First time where some where like this has asked for tips, maybe it's the norm in canada?

Name: Nishma Bhatt
Review: Great experience. We tried Deadwood Valley and it was a blast. Most certainly will be visiting next time. Everyone must try this regardless of you are into gaming or not. Far more entertaining experience than my Oculus at home.  I didn't experience any nausea and could have managed to play more than 30 minutes (which usually I'm unable to do with my Oculus at home) . Game time is 30 minutes, wish there could be an option for "Add-on" game time or something to play extra.

Name: Alethea Yujuico
Review: This place is definitely worth the price if you want a guaranteed great VR experience! Would definitely go back and try the other games

Name: Donna Divina
Review: Amazing experience. So fun!

Name: Nikiesha Hall
Review: Such a FUN activity! Will definitely visit again soon

Name: LAN LI
Review: Really impressive! Everyone should try this at least once.

Name: Anastasia S
Review: We did recommend it as a fun team experience at work.

Name: Tom Nguyen
Review: Best vr experience. Would do it again

Name: Navee Ratnam
Review: Really had a good time with my friends, will definitely come back!

Name: Brittany Chase
Review: I had an awesome experience! Thanks to one of the workers by the name of Derek.

Name: Yao_2018 C
Review: Lynn is the best!  we actually traveled from US to Canada. The experience is so amazing, we definitely will be back, if it can give 10 starts I will ! She is so kind and pretty.

Name: Yi Xin
Review: It was the first time I played VR, we chose the zombie game and turned out really good. really good experience with our guide Lynn, she is super sweet and cute, and we can even get a video of the game. Pretty awesome, definitely gonna come back again!

Name: Matt & Nat Cormier
Review: So fun!!!! Antony was fantastic in making sure our first experience was memorable!

Name: Harasees Kaur
Review: It was an extremely exhilarating experience. The amazing staff, especially Antony, made out VR experience even better. We were celebrating a birthday and he made sure he did everything on his part to make it memorable. 10/10 would recommended this place.

Name: Fady Yatooma
Review: I wanted to shoutout Derek for going the extra mile to let us in after arriving late to our reservation, thank you Derek! The experience was a lot of fun and totally worth a try, we played Dead Wood Valley  and had a blast. They also email you a trailer and a montage of your experience, 10/10

Name: Elle
Review: Amazing experience, the vibe and VR was totally awesome. The full body gear and equipment was such a plus that it makes you feel that you are in reality. It's cool that they have a recording of you playing. Highly recommend this place for date, for fun, and with friends/family.

Name: Mike Pal
Review: We will be back to try other maps.

Name: Tanya B
Review: business "temporarily closed" and has not refunded the money for bookings purchased for Feb 14 2023as they promised. No reply to emails or  on the business number listed. Terrible business etiquette and treatment of customers.. I will even go as far as saying fraud. Now forced to dispute charges with the bank and waste time.

Name: George Mosaed
Review: The game was never restarted or anything either, we just kept getting abruptly thrown back in wherever we left off. I can see how immersive and fun it can be, but the way our experience went, it doesnt feel at all like we got what we paid for.  The videos they give you at the end are nice.

Name: Joyce Yin
Review: DO NOT BOOK THIS PLACE! This location is closed, but their website still allows you to book, they'll take your money, cancel on you, and never issue a refund. Stay away!

Name: Elaine Columbano
Review: Great experience and friendly staff

Name: J S
Review: I believe we paid like 65-70$ each and we played for 34 minutes total. We played the zombie game which is basically Left4Dead but a king of the hill mode where you can't leave a 15x15 area. You can't pick the same weapon as anyone else, which is weird. I ended up with the shotgun which basically had an effective range of 5 feet. There are 3 chapters in the game and each last about 10 minutes. We ended up "winning" the game and it ended very quickly. Again, the game is pretty basic and it's not very hard or scary. I thought the game would be at least an hour but 34 minutes? That is ridiculous for the price. The idea is cool, you get VR headset, arm and leg trackers, and you hold a mock weapon. But the game is just so easy and short. It's fun while you play but not something you'd ever want to play again, even the other "games" which seem like the same thing just different themes.

Name: TheJuicyMeezy
Review: Overall it was fun experience just wish it was longer !

Name: Ashley H
Review: Highly recommend this experience to everyone!

Name: Mabiala GONDO
Review: Very fun. First time trying VR. Will recommend to go with friends (up to 6). You will have fun. The only cons is the session is only 30min, I wish it was a bit longer.

Name: Lia
Review: Happy Chinese New Year!!

Name: Claire
Review: Great experience, the game we chose is mid level difficulty Amber Sky, it is very exciting. Our assistance Lynn is very helpful. Recommend to visit

Name: Hongsheng Lin
Review: Lynn has been such a nice instructor! The amber sky has been so fun!

Name: Laura Holanda
Review: Lynn helped us and she was really nice and a great employee. Would come back again! So fun

Name: Umar Muhammad
Review: Was fun!!

Name: Reihaneh Ostadian
Review: Recommended activity for groups! Super fun!

Name: Mark Rebello
Review: Incredible but time playing feels incredibly short for the $.  It is cost prohibitive at the moment to everyone in that it is very expensive to experience this VR group activity.  That being said I have to give it 5 star as it is the VR oculus experience on steroids!!!  Incredible how real it feels, screams of laughter and fright from all as we did the new zombie adventure reel.  Highly recommended but wish that it included 2 experiences so the time would be longer and feel like you were getting better value.  5 stars as it really is next level VR.

Name: Pedrum Sd
Review: Surprisingly good

Name: Cindy Ma
Review: Will definitely be back!

Name: Shadi Mohammadi
Review: Amazing experience!!

Name: Shawn S
Review: Amazing experience. Thanks John for helping us through with ease. Team TopShotta Strikeforce will be back!

Name: M Riz
Review: 5 out of 5! Had an awesome time. Cant wait to plan another visit.

Name: Red Rover
Review: Truly an amazing experience. Appreciate Nas for the hospitality. Everything felt real and my friends and I enjoyed the trill.

Name: Chris Ireland
Review: Had an amazing  experience,  it was a great time and had a ton of fun.

Name: Joyce Chan
Review: Came with 2 other friends and we played Deadwood Mansion. As a horror fan, it's definitely scary in the beginning and I had so much fun! Definitely a great experience but it was pricey for like 30 minutes of entertainment thus, the removal of a star. Our hostess was very nice though. And they do send you a hilarious clip of your VR experience. Would do it again, despite the price but unfortunately, not very often. Again because of the price.

Name: Farrukh Sultanov
Review: The game itself was amazing. However, I have to mention that the whole experience lasted about 25 minutes. Based on their website, we were promised about 60+ minutes. So I think the VR sandbox should be honest with their customers considering we are paying $60+. All in all, the experience was disappointing. Thank you Sandbox for nothing.

Name: Danny Liu
Review: Very fun group experience. Highly recommend trying at least once. That being said  you really only get about 40 mins of game time, so keep thar in mind.

Name: Teflon Tiff
Review: Great experience!! We've already been twice, and the 2nd time we played back to back games!

Name: Giovanni Esposito
Review: First time playing VR and had so much fun. Would highly recommend checking our this place for a realistic VR experience.

Name: Brad King
Review: This was amazing and Ash who set everything up for us was a great guide.  Loved it and will definitely be coming back.

Name: MrChocheech
Review: Alot of fun but they strap the mask on so tight that it hurts your nose. All 4 in my group had the same uncomfortable experience. Everything else about it is amazing

Name: Rob Dreblow
Review: Excellent fun. One session is enough for now

Name: Natalya
Review: Great for date night

Name: Stan Marsh
Review: There's other VR places in downtown Toronto that are better than this dump.

Name: Lily Li
Review: Super fun experience! We did the Deadwood Manor and it was super interactive and fun, pretty intense exercise as the gear got quite heavy after awhile, we were all sweating after! Loved the experience! We did have some minor technical issues but the staff was willing to give us a voucher for next time, excited to come try another game!

Name: Maleha J
Review: I am so happy I went.. would I go again.. ofcourse.. no doubt in my mind.. good ppl .. experience.. enjoyment.. loved it!!!

Name: Baba Yaga
Review: Very entertaining,  so much fun, highly recommended

Name: Finding Foxy
Review: Great experience and staff

Name: AJ Paluzzi
Review: Very fun experience. Immersive without being disorienting and uncomfortable. Game lasted about 45 minutes after setup and the "trailer" video they give you afterwards is a fun bonus. Will definitely be back.

Name: Alec Mason
Review: So much fun. The graphics are amazing. If you really want to experience VR you must go. So much fun

Name: F. S.
Review: I have been there twice, tried the amber sky and the deadwood valley.. great place for team games and parking is located at the same building for 9$ a day

Name: Bob Smith
Review: Just visited this place with family the other day! Best time ever!!! Prices were a bit high but the customer service was well worth it! Big shoutout to Sabith for making the experience very enjoyable! Recommend to everyone!

Name: Rahul Meghowalia
Review: In terms of prizes a bit on the higher side, but still a really fun experience.

Name: Phillip Fearon
Review: Although a little expensive, the experience was a lot of fun. The family went for a birthday outing and enjoyed the process of suiting up, preview training and full VR experience. (Star Trek Discovery).

Name: Raahil Ebrahim
Review: Super fun experience, felt so realistic. Not what I expected will come here again and again! Derek was so helpful and enthusiastic about the games.

Name: Isaac Lee
Review: One of the best VR experiences I have ever had in Ontario! Sabith was incredibly helpful and enthusiastic. He walked us through all the rules and instructions smoothly and made us feel comfortable. I would highly recommend groups to visit Sandbox VR for an unforgettable experience.

Name: Kevin Ranch
Review: It's totally worth the experience! U gotta try it at least once.

Name: A_llye B.
Review: A bit expensive but really fun! Host was welcoming and wonderful experience overall

Name: ELEEN BEAUTY SPOT
Review: Such an amazing experience. My son loved it. Very cooperative  staff. One of the best place so far VR

Name: Noot Noot
Review: nice

Name: Anusha Santhakumar
Review: Fun activity to try out with friends!

Name: V
Review: Wish the game was bit longer but will definitely will come back!

Name: Arj Parker
Review: So much fun! Our host Derek was great and explained everything clearly. We had no issues whatsoever! Def wear light clothing as you will sweat!

Name: Mohamed saadaq
Review: First time going there, a great experience would definitely go again, we had Felicia help she was amazing!

Name: Mary M
Review: Overall, will definitely be back to try other experiences.

Name: Miyoku Tee
Review: A mind blowing experience! One of the best VR area I have ever been to. The full body gear makes the virtual world feels like it's your own reality! You even get a high quality video recording of your time being there. I highly recommend this place. It will give you an epic memory that you won't forget!

Name: ryan prince
Review: Great experience, would definitely go back had lots of fun with the group, would definitely recommend coming dressed to sweat. Our host Ryan was great!

Name: Nicholas Okhonmina
Review: 1000% worth it! Amazing experience, best with yo to 6 people.

Name: Sheryl Kam
Review: Came here with a group of six people (max) and had so much fun. The employees are SUPER helpful, accommodating, and know what they're doing. I think we played for about 45 min. It costs $60 per person, no matter how many people are in your group, so over $400 after taxes for our group. For that cost I wish the videos and stats they send over had more to it, as it costs them little to nothing. At least show more footage of the team playing the game, it will encourage customers to share their videos with other people, and make it feel more worth.

Name: Natasha
Review: terrible experience and overpriced. we played for around 45 mins which was not worth what we paid. for majority of the game my weapon wasn't working (I would pull the trigger but it didn't shoot) and I signaled for help 3 times w/o anyone coming to check in on us???? I couldn't enjoy the game w my friends cuz I kept dying as I had no defense. My goggles were also not tightened and kept moving during the game so I couldn't clearly see what was happening. would never go back.

Name: Ammar Ahmed
Review: Great experience, had soo much fun. And Ash was an amazing employer

Name: Mohamed Yusuf
Review: Every min was fun. Ash is a W host.

Name: Mohammed Shamsa
Review: the hour was full of fun, if you go ask for ash hes great

Name: Alexandre Ahyoon
Review: Only complaint is i wish the graphics were better but i think that will improve with time.

Name: Nasrudin Ajab
Review: Had a blast!!!! Ash is an amazing host!!

Name: Yasmin Coutry
Review: Thank you Derek for an exceptional customer service and for making us feel welcomed!

Name: Darren
Review: A really fun and immersive experience. All my friends really enjoyed it! The reason why it is not a 5 star is because of the price. 6 people came up to $400 total! $400! At this rate, i could have bought my own VR.

Name: Jackson
Review: The plot is good and the level of horror is just right. And after the end, the video of the production was sent directly to the mailbox. It is great and will be kept as a souvenir.

Name: Jay Narain
Review: Had a blessed time with the mandem, Sabith is a W mans

Name: Junayd Din
Review: This place is insane, had a great time and sabith was a great guide for us! Had a ton of fun and will definitely be coming back. Would 100% recommend for an outing!

Name: Odyssious
Review: THE BEST EXPERIENCE, UNBELIEVABLE... so much fun and the service was amazing thanks to Sabith. W MANS

Name: Larry Luk
Review: Played their latest scenario Deadwood Valley. It is a little pricey but well worth the experience. It was very immersive and the motion capture is so well done. Will bring other friends to this place.

Name: Kerry-Ann Reynolds
Review: Do not book with them, they are unfair and greedy despite how much money they make. They took my money and refused to refund. Special place in hell for such a company.
Responce: Hi Kerry-Ann, thank you for your feedback.',"Being understandable to our customers is always our priority.  Although we require 24 hours' notice in advance for cancellation or reschedule, we understand unexpected things would happen, and we always try our best to accommodate our customers. Since we cannot find any record of booking under your name, please do not hesitate to get in touch with us and provide further information. We will investigate further and provide the best solution for you.  Once again, we are very thankful to our customers, and we are always here to help and provide one of the best services in town.  Thank you.

Name: Lataevia *
Review: So fun!! Sam was an amazing host !! Will be back

Name: jaemi v
Review: I was a bit concerned about this being worth the money after I found out it was only a 30 minute long experience, but it definitely was and I will be coming back another day for another game. I booked an experience for two. We arrived early and someone was there to help us immediately. Our host was Derek and he was really pleasant (really thoughtful w/ asking about needing the restrooms and explained everything well). Super fun experience with a fun little surprise at the end. I recommend this for anyone!

Name: Julia S
Review: Fantastic place to build a team!

Name: Ezekiel Baluyot
Review: The guys and I had an amazing experience. Shoutout to Ryan for coming in clutch during our session, you a real one. 10/10 recommend, would come again.

Name: ruijie liu
Review: All in all, a great VR experience, especially for first-timers.

Name: Ashley-Marie Krios
Review: Place was super fun and staff were super friendly. Felicia was a delight and made my birthday extra special.

Name: Kezia
Review: The staff were super friendly and helpful! And the VR experience was so much fun!

Name: Dd Kn
Review: Amazing place. Had a great time. Would go again. Most of the staff members were very nice, except one lady, she was very unprofessional. She is the reason I have given it a 4 vs a 5 star.

Name: Antonio Chenko
Review: Very recommended, very friendly and helpful staff

Name: shukri hussein
Review: Ridwan was so helpful and great at explaining the game to us. We had such a fun experience because of Ridwan!

Name: Nemhard Jenkins
Review: Would recommend very intense and amazing. One of the staff Derek is really nice and helpful. You will have a blast perfect for groups

Name: Rodolfo Maspoch
Review: Lots of fun and laughs. Great family and/or group experience. We will be back!

Name: Dhruvraj Gohil
Review: Totally unique experience.. It was fun and thrilling. The Games will end based on what you choose during game. Haptics and graphics felt so real. Our host was Evan, his service and guidance was excellent. If someone from your group having birthday just tell them that it's your birthday and they will arrange a small suprise at the very end. We played Deadwood valley, if you booked some other game you can change it once you get there.

Name: Anna Fortier
Review: Rafid was our host, very friendly and helpful. The experience was pretty cool, something new and different! Definitely recommend giving it a try!

Name: Kyle Doré
Review: Still, a very immersive experience, and the team was very kind and helpful.

Name: Azad
Review: This was a wonderful and unique experience! It was my first virtual reality experience, so I didn't go in expecting anything, yet I was amazed at how realistic and fun it was. Our host was Rafid and he was most amazing. I would have given it 5 stars if the head gear was more comfortable. I found it painful on my nose, especially when it's a little heavy. I also did not like how you can't change guns in the middle of the game. I had the pistol and it was a really boring gun, and although the experience can be paused, they did not switch out my gun when asked to. It is also quite expensive! It would be more logical to charge a set fee for the booking of the session, and a reduced fee per player. So instead of $60 per player, it should be $60 plus $40 per additional player. They provide lenses for people with glasses which is really cool, and they also make a highlight video of the experience and send it out to every participant, which is so so lovely as I love photographs. Although it is an exceptional feature, I wish the videos were longer. Overall a wonderful experience

Name: Web3 Coders
Review: Awesome place!! Rapid was a great host. I recommend 100/10!

Name: Hassan Furrukh
Review: Jennifer was great! incredibly fun experience!

Name: Daniel Thevarasalingam
Review: We highly recommend the Deadwood Valley experience!

Name: Allison P
Review: Had an amazing experience at Sandbox VR with Rafid as our guide. He was super helpful n honest n overall a great guy. Deadwood valley was super fun and thrilling. Will be coming back soon!

Review: We had a great time. Our host Karman did a really good job in scoomodating us.

Review: This was  amazing!! So much fun and Rafid did a great job in helping us to prepare for our killing spree!

Review: VR was super fun, way better than expected. Rafid was super friendly and had us on our way in no time. Great experience, coming again for sure

Review: Brought my family from abroad here and we had the best time!! It made our night and we will definitely be back!! Rafid made our experience superb!! Thank you Rafid see you all soon!!

Review: So much fun!  Had a great time with friends, staff were very nice. Especially Sam who explained the game and helped us gear up.

Name: Jessica Law
Review: We had Sam to guide us through the whole experience and he was very thorough in his explanation and ensure we had an enjoyable and full experience there. Thanks Sam!

Name: Bradley Andrade
Review: Booked the AMBER SKY 2088 experience on Saturday June 25th 2022  not knowing what to expect. It was an amazing experience and felt very real. Henry really went above and beyond to make the experience the most it could be. I may have got the MVP in the game but Henry was the real MVP. Thank you for making the experience great for my family!

Name: Dante S
Review: Came here towards the end of June 2022, ultimately had an astounding experience. The staff was incredibly friendly and the game was very immersive and entertaining, was worth every penny.

Name: Linda Thompson

Name: Si Gao
Review: It was a lot of fun! Felt so real, I was afraid of the height loll

Name: Vlad Dubrovsky
Review: We did the Curse of Davy Jones experience and really enjoyed it. Jennifer was very helpful and patient in getting us all set up. Thank you Jennifer!

Name: Sudi Abdulle
Review: I had a great time at Sandbox VR and it was a great first experience doing VR. Our host Ridwan explained everything to us extremely well and was very kind and funny. He was patient and made things seem very clear as I was very scared lol

Name: Adam Abdille
Review: I had a wonderful experience at sandbox VR. Ridwan was such a nice fella who helped me and my partner enjoy our experience! I would recommend Ridwan to any new VR users as he was very helpful answering questions.

Name: Arjit Singh
Review: Went to Sandbox VR to learn more about VR and the extent of what is possible. An experience that is 100% worthwhile - although the $60 price-tag might look a little much, the amount of tech that goes into making this experience and the upkeep of the place add up and make it seem not bad at all. Me and my partner had very little experience with VR but my professor who was also with us has quite a bit of dev for VR was also with us - we all came out exceptionally satisfied with the experience and only have good things to say. We tried the Amber Sky experience and want to be back for more!! Ahmar, our host, also made sure we were comfortable throughout.

Name: Dishan Shah
Review: Sandbox VR is must try.

Name: akanksha sharma
Review: Had an amazing experience at sandboxvr, Toronto. Staff was super friendly especially Ash for his excellent customer service skills! Would definitely visit again.

Name: alyshan jahani
Review: We played the deadwood mansion game. 4 of us. The facility and technology is amazing. Sam who was setting us up was great. Def would recommend!

Name: zoniya aamir
Review: This was an extremely enjoyable experience and i cant wait to go back again! 10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for a fun activity in toronto. The staff was also really friendly and considerate!

Name: Danny
Review: Will come again!!

Name: Hassan al Shammasi
Review: It was aight, technology not there yet but a fun experience. Worth a try

Name: Bill Wang
Review: Ash is so friendly and supportive! Amber sky is so funny!

Name: Leting Xu
Review: Highly recommended to everyone! Ash is a great host, the game is very interesting and very real! Come visit and play on the weekend! Appointment needed!

Name: Geff Ramos
Review: Did Amber Sky 2088 today. Just one word A-M-A-Z-Z-I-N-G!!! Great experience!!! Felt like Captain America - throwing the shield and all!!! Felt like hours in there. Rafid was very helpful and answered our all our questions. This is a definitely a MUST TRY!!!

Review: Can't wait to try out the other games.

Review: Will return to try all formats and guns.

Review: AmaZing time and Sam was a great guide to my first VR experience would definitely recommend!

Review: 10/10 Great experience! I picked Deadwood Mansion. Our host Derek is super friendly. I took my mom there to try VR game the first time. He patiently explained and prepared us for this amazing experience. The game is scary, realistic and a bit intense for 2 people to handle. But it was totally a blast.

Review: We played Star Trek at sand wave, Rafid was an amazing host and he walked us through the tutorial and how to put the equipment on. Also Star Trek game was an amazing game and we had so many missions. It was so much fun

Review: This was an amazing experience. I wish we had one more continue though haha. Derek our guide was amazing and polite. Would love to go again...again...and again....

Review: Great place to bring friends, had a great time and would come again. Actually was my second time

Name: Nick Costa
Review: Awesome experience.

Name: Chanel Chahine
Review: Deadman mansion was absolutely amazing 10/10 would recommend. Sabith was super friendly and set us up nicely.

Name: Adam Hertler
Review: Dead man mansion is super fun. Our rep Sabith did an amazing job. Thank you!

Name: Zhihao Spencer Shu
Review: It was a pretty good experience here, and Sam is really a good host, we all have fun.

Name: Mariano Maza
Review: My 8 year old and me went to "Curse of Davy Jones" and it was great. You need to make it at least 15 min to sign the waivers and get the equipment on your ankles, wrists, vest, backpack, VR goggles and headphones (you can't wear glasses). The host (Sam was awesome!) walks you through the process and helps answering any questions. Once you're all set, the game starts. It was a lot of fun. You get helped through the headphones if you get stuck. It probably lasted for about 30 min. Then you take off the equipment and go review the video. It's a well thought product and will certainly comeback to explore other games.

Name: Jiayi Wu
Review: Amazing experience!!! VR is so much funnier than I thought would be! Definitely want to try again!

Name: Eric F
Review: We'll be returning to try other maps for sure.

Name: Pauline peng
Review: Great experience! A nice place to have some fun and exercise!

Name: Olivia xie
Review: Great experience and a nice place to hang out with friends! This was my first VR experience and it was exactly what I expected. The game was very submerging. Our host Jennifer was super friendly and helpful as well.

Name: Daniella Kopernik
Review: Had an amazing time at VR, it was my first experience going with friends and it was a blast especially the customer service. They were exceptional and very interactive with us and made us feel very welcome. Shout out to Rafid and Evan for the help!! 100% recommend.

Name: Angela Prijoles
Review: Already been to this place twice and had so much fun both times!!!! Evan and Rafid were very helpful and super cool! 10/10 recommend this place love it

Name: Dubsy
Review: Absolutely Amazing VR Experience.     We decided to stay and play again right away it was so good.    Rafid was a great host.    The space was huge and clean.  Highly recommend trying this with the family and friends.

Name: Neon Tran
Review: Highly recommend coming here with friends or family, its a great experience that is worth it!

Name: Umer Siddiqui
Review: Came here as a group of 4 today and tried the Deadwood Mansion experience, it was such a fun experience and felt extremely realistic. Our host Sam was very good at explaining the entire process to us, making the experience more enjoyable, and was overall very knowledgeable at his job. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to have a fun time with their family and friends!

She made it a very comfortable, fun and sociable experience as well!

Review: Had an amazing experience!! We had Sabith as our guide and he did a great job at explaining the room. Great staff overall and friendly environment, definitely returning!!

Review: My friends and I had an absolute blast at Sandbox! The playback was hilarious to watch as well.

Name: Nic
Review: Had an amazing time! First time for everyone in our group and the staff were so welcoming, which made the experience even better. Ash gave us thorough instructions and great guidance, this place exceeded our expectations and we will be back! Would definitely recommend this as a must try experience in the city!

Name: Izaaz Bhagat
Review: Back again it was too much fun so beautiful I gotta come again

Name: Annie Zhong
Review: Such a fun experience! Ash and the Sandbox team were super helpful. The videos you get at the end were very cool. We did Amber Sky but would definitely try the other games!

Name: Vera Chen
Review: Ash was such a great host and we had such an awesome experience !!!!!!!

Name: Rachel Lam
Review: Awesome experience! Ash was informative and helpful. Will be returning!!

Name: James Wan
Review: We played Amber Sky with six people and it was amazing! Ash was a great host and we can't wait to come back!

Name: Gates Urie
Review: Best time with my boys and ash the worker there was lit and the nicest person I met in Toronto

Name: Yubo Wang
Review: Great experience! definitely will come back again for another game. host Sam was super friendly and thoughtful, explained and guide us through with everything we need to know. RECOMMEND!

Name: Mars N
Review: S/o to Ash! Super helpful and knowledgeable as it was our first time at Sandbox VR

Name: Zeerus45
Review: Went with a group of 5, deadwood mansion. Staff was patient and helpful. Had a great time! Used to think VR was kinda gimmicky but now I gotta say I'm excited to see where it goes in the future

Name: Vlad Popa
Review: We were a group of 5 and did Amber Sky. I would definitely go again and try out a different experience like the Deadwood Mansion. If you've never been to VR, or you've done just regular VR (just a headset) and liked that, highly recommend trying out what these guys have to offer.

Name: Joshua Proulx
Review: Only played on the oculus quest and this was next level, Sam was my host and he did great.. awesome experience

Name: Gorilla Gaming95
Review: Went for my buddy's birthday. It was a great experience, super fun, and the staff were all extremely nice. The place is very clean. Will definitely be going back and would recommend others to try it out.

Name: George Fares
Review: Really amazing place. Evan was absolutely awesome, all the staff are great. Super clean space, they even have air purifiers.

Name: Conrad Gardner
Review: I've played VR before, so I wasn't expecting to be blown away, but to blow my guests away. The result however was all expectations were blown out of the water. The haptic vest, plus holding a physical gun all added to the incredibly immersive and entertaining experience. We loved it so much that we went in again the next week and had even more fun. The experience was great, all the employees are kind and welcoming, and the video that you get afterwards makes the entire visit extremely memorable. I've probably watched our groups video a dozen times over. Definitely worth a visit, the only thing I'd mention is that it is a bit costly, but the cost is well appropriated for all the different avenues of fun you'll have.

Name: Steve and Kim Kuzmak
Review: Tried the Curse of Davey Jones, was a blast.  Sandbox is definitely the best VR experience I've tried!

Name: shwnbonn
Review: What an awesome experience! 10/10 would recommend. Our host Rafid made us feel super comfortable and everything was nice and clean. Will 100% be returning with a larger group.

Name: Mariam Jama
Review: MOST AMAZING EXPERIENCE EVER! I'll definitely come back here for the other 5 games! I love creating content on tiktok @tophijabi and this place is designed beautifully. I look forward to sharing more pictures on here!

Name: Aid Almusri
Review: I loved the place. Great zombie game. Friendly staff. Shoutout to Jackie

Name: Michael Li
Review: Absolutely unreal experience. We played deadwood mansion and it was so incredibly immersive and fun. The staff were very knowledgeable and friendly. Shoutout to Sam - thanks for making our first VR experience such a dope one!

Name: Su Sheekhnur
Review: Amazing experience the staff were so helpful and cool. Our host Rafid was great. 100/100 would come back and encourage any group to do so as well

Name: cherral isa
Review: Also shout out to Rebecca, she was very helpful and even helped take photo on my phone, she was fantastic, she also helped my friend that got too scared half way. you're doing amazing girl!

Name: Panikann M
Review: We had the most amazing experience at Sandbox! Deadwood Mansion was scary enough to be exciting and thrilling, but not terrifying enough to make you quit. We even got a trailer/video of our experience emailed to us after that shows what we saw and our scores, which was a great surprise! Rebecca was our host and was so lovely and fun to talk to about the other experiences they have. We're excited to come back and try Amber Sky 2088.

Name: gloredy Ramirez
Review: excellent experience my friends and I loved it, it's a terrible feeling when they attack you hahaha but it was incredible.  I hope and add more games.  The staff was very nice, especially the guy Sam was a great support, we are tourists and we do not speak English very well and he supports us at all times.  excellent boy.

Name: Tyler C
Review: Had a complete blast here. Went with my gf and we had so much fun shooting up zombies. Our host Evan was great and it was a smooth experience. We definitely want to come back with a group of friends to play.

Name: Jess
Review: Didn't know what to expect as none of us have tried VR before, I honestly thought it might be a tad bit gimmicky, BUT my goodness the experience was UNREAL, we were a party of 4 and it was such a great experience. If you're hesitating to book an experience here, I hope this review changes your mind. I do wish it lasted longer because we were all having such an amazing time! We all loved the video at the end, and even more - loved that they include it as part of your booking! The staff here are super helpful and so nice! 10/10 can't wait to go back and slay more zombies!!

Name: Dylan Zhang
Review: Played with friends for two sections, so much fun with both of them, Rebecca leads us through the whole section with great professional matter. Definitely gonna come back for more sections

Name: Tris Vo
Review: Had such a fun experience here!! We were a group of 4 to try the deadwood mansion experience and it was amazing! Our host Rebecca was super kind and thorough explaining the process and was super accommodating. The recap videos and end screen was hilarious as well. Would definitely recommend!

Name: Ashleen Raina
Review: Had an amazing experience with sandbox! I have never tried anything like it before- I would recommend it to everyone! Sam was a great help and very accommodating!! Will be back!!!

Name: Jacky L.
Review: The game was very cool. Maybe the room could be a little bigger and maybe add more games. Sam was nice too

Name: Melanie Chitti
Review: Just did the Deadwood Mansion room with a group of 5 and would recommend to everyone looking for a fun summer activity. Well worth the $60/pp, game was so realistic and the technology was pretty cool. Our host Sam was really helpful, friendly and made the experience much more fun. Will be back again!!!

Name: Shiri Levshtein
Review: Amazing experience. Was so much fun! The only thing is that I wish there was a little more explaining of what to expect in the game prior, and also you can't hear yourself speak the way you hear others so you end up yelling alot.  Would definitely go back!!!!

Name: alex zhao
Review: If you want to play VR games then this is the perfect place to go. Content Of the game itself is fun, relies on a bit of teamworking. All the staff are super friendly and helpful, the place is also very clean.

Name: Aaron Malig
Review: This place completely blew my expectations.  Sam was an excellent host and made sure we understood the rules of the game.  We played Amber Sky game mode and it was an intense experience.  You can play with anywhere from 2 to 6 players.  Can't wait to come back again and try the other game modes!  THANKS SAM!

Name: Jeremy Marsh
Review: It's it but pricey, but totally worth it. Will be going back to try the games.

Name: Michal W
Review: Was great - 10 or of 10 would do it again and my birthday vid they added was awesome

Name: Evan E
Review: Rafid and the whole experience were great

Name: Tracy Marsh
Review: We played the Star Trek away mission, and I very much look forward to going neck and trying another experience!

Name: Nicholas D. Zalevich
Review: Absolutely amazing experience. Blows all other vr arcades in the city out of the water. Would highly recommend it, not only of vr gamers but for anyone looking for a unique experience. Normally I get sick from vr games after about 10 minutes, in the case of the games at sandbox I felt great and could have played for many hours without feeling sick. Go play, you won't regret it.

Name: Sanjif Raj
Review: Pretty fun VR experience. Group of 6 people defend against zombies with a variety of guns. Definitely recommend checking it out!

Name: Caoutham Vasan
Review: The experience was way better than i could have imagined. Shout outs to Rafeed he was awesome

Name: Banu Sundaralingam
Review: Super fun experience with a group of friends. Would highly recommend.

Name: Reihane Namdari
Review: Excellent experience but a little expensive

Name: Timon Chan
Review: Pretty fun. Sam was patient, professional, and made sure we had a good time.

Name: Jamie Pink
Review: Our host Sam is super nice!!

Name: Vivian Chou
Review: This experience totally exceeded my expectations! Sam did a great job making sure we were prepared and was so friendly! Highly recommended it to everyone!
